page.title: 03SCHOOL:POSITION,CURRICULUM
page.content: The school is the focal point of the village. It is the only non-licensed building suitable for general use. It is used as a Sunday School, as well as for informal meetings and concerts. Whislt the children are generally taught through the English language, the children who have Welsh as a first language are taught through that language on an individual basis. all of the children are taught welsh, be it to varying degrees of attainment. the basic education is formal to ensure a grasp of the fundamentals. But, a wide scope is provided. Due to its small size, its future is now under debate, and will probably close in 2 to 3 years
